resources.string: %s- Each day is a new opportunity to grow and be a better version of myself.
%s- Every challenge in my life is an opportunity to learn from.
%s- I have so much to be grateful for.
%s- Good things are always coming into my life.
%s- New opportunities await me at every turn.
%s- I have the courage to follow my heart.
%s- Things will unfold at precisely the right time.
%s- I will be present in all the moments that this day brings.
